articles.content:
Tony Mowbray is anticipating an 'emotional' reunion with Blackburn Rovers as he returns to Ewood Park for the first time on Tuesday night.

articles.title: T20 World Cup: Scotland shock West Indies in Group B - BBC
articles.description: Scotland, ranked 15th in the world, start their T20 World Cup campaign in brilliant fashion with a shock victory over West Indies.
articles.content:
